name: TXP_INTESTINE_STATUS_HX
description: This table contains the intestine status information for a transplant episode.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the episode record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: INTESTINE_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: The patient's intestine status as defined by the United Network of Organ Sharing (UNOS).

columns.name: INTESTINE_STATUS_DT
columns.description: The date the corresponding intestine status was last updated for the transplant episode.

columns.name: IN_ST_RSN_OTHER
columns.description: The free-text reason for the patient's intestine status for the transplant episode.
